name: Flip Flop Forest Swipe Block
description:
Tiles are moved by flipping them in groups.Press and drag to select the tiles you want to flip. When all tiles are in place all numbers should be in order, unflipped and unrotated.

You have a limited amount of moves to complete each level. If you made a mistake you can always undo your last move using the designated button at the bottom. Every level can be beaten in 6 or less moves! Flip Flop Forest is the world's most simple and easy to use coin toss application. Let's toss - heads or tails?

If you are used to make decisions by tossing up a coin and unfortunately you don't have any coin in your pocket, just relax don't lose hope, Flip Flop is here for you. Now you can make decisions by tossing up a virtual coin. Just swipe over the screen!

With this app , you can flip(mirror) an image vertically or horizontally. Flip multiple images , Batch image flipping -PRO Feature You can flip image Vertically and Horizontally Also you can Rotate images.
